value.description: Create order for getting specimen, Set up inhouse testing,  generate order for any sendouts and submit with specimen

reasonCode.text: The Task.reason should only be included if there is no Task.focus or if it differs from the reason indicated on the focus

note.text: This is an example to demonstrate using task for actioning a servicerequest and to illustrate how to populate many of the task elements - this is the parent task that will be broken into subtask to grab the specimen and a sendout lab test

--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
